name: Chalk And The Mission To Fend Off Against The FBI Brought Back From Hell Edition
name_original: Chalk And The Mission To Fend Off Against The FBI Brought Back From Hell Edition
description:
Chalk Remastered is an 2D FPS-Like Shooter, that revolves around beating bosses and collecting resources mid-fight.

https://www.newgrounds.com/projects/games/4597237/ - NEWGROUNDS VERSION

--WHAT IS EVEN FUCKING HAPPENING--

  • So you play as Chalk, she is a female rock (because why not) and she just posted some very illegal stuff onto newgrounds. She didnt read the rules so the people at newgrounds called the FBI on her. Next day in the park the FBI catched her defendless (or so they thought) so they springed right into action. But Chalk was armed so your mission is to fight off the FBI so you dont go to jail lmao.

if you still have no idea what the hell is happening then just go watch the trailer


--Why would i play it then huh?!?!?--

  • Uhh if you play chalk you will start attracting a shittt ton of bitches!!!!
  • You get to fight decently designed bosses that are sure to give you trouble while playing for the first time!!! (10 bosses)
  • Over 9 different weapons to toy around with!!!!
  • 8 Accessories that allow you to break the game in half?!?!?!
  • A Save and Load System that comes in handy!!@!@!@!@!@

And so much much more...

SO PLAY NOW NOW NOW GO PLAY IT NOW NOW NO hi
